trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when e-mail is sent using an <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> and cannot be delivered to all recipients.
trans-unit.target: A exceção que é acionada quando a mensagem de correio eletrónico é enviada através de um <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"> </xref> e não é possível entregar a todos os destinatários.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException.InnerExceptions%2A> property contains the exceptions received while attempting to send e-mail.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException.InnerExceptions%2A>propriedade contém as exceções recebidas ao tentar enviar correio eletrónico.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException.InnerExceptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: The e-mail might have been successfully delivered to some of the recipients.
trans-unit.target: O correio eletrónico poderá ter sido com êxito entregar alguns dos destinatários.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an empty instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância vazia do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref> classe com o <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> especificado

trans-unit.source: The exception message.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem de exceção.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class from the specified instances of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> classes.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref> classe a partir de instâncias especificadas do <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>classes.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException> class.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor implementa a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>interface para a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException>classe.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> instância que contém as informações necessárias para serializar o novo <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que contém a origem da sequência serializada que estão associada com o novo <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.String> and inner <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref> classe com o especificados <xref:System.String>e interna <xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The exception message.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem de exceção.

trans-unit.source: The inner exception.
trans-unit.target: A exceção interna.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.String> and array of type <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref:System.String>e a matriz do tipo <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The exception message.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem de exceção.

trans-unit.source: The array of recipients with delivery errors.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de destinatários com erros de entrega.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data that is needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Preenche um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> instância com os dados que é necessário para serializar o <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to be used.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> a ser utilizado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> to be used.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>a ser utilizado.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets one or more <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref>s that indicate the e-mail recipients with SMTP delivery errors.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um ou mais <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"> </xref>s que indique os destinatários de correio electrónico com erros de entrega de SMTP.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"></xref> that lists the recipients with delivery errors.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientException"> </xref> que apresenta uma lista de destinatários com erros de entrega.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref> class from the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> instances.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref> classe a partir de especificada <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>instâncias.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException> class.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor implementa a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>interface para a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException>classe.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> que contém as informações necessárias para serializar o novo <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que contém a origem da sequência serializada que estão associada com o novo <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
